    所有类和接口

    类
    说明
    ApplicationLauncher
    JavaFX Application launcher class that extends Application.
    CreateOrEditRecipeTest
    Test class for recipe creation/editing functionality, strictly following the test case design from the EC_BVA table.
    DatabaseManager
    Database manager class responsible for managing MyBatis configuration and mapper instances.
    ImageService
    Service class for handling image-related operations in the recipe management system.
    LoginFXMLController
    FXML Controller class for the login view.
    LoginFXMLControllerTest
    Controller test class for login page, focusing on two scenarios specified in the Log In table.
    LoginTest
    Model layer test class for login functionality, focusing on business logic validation.
    LoginView
    JavaFX Stage class for the login view of the recipe management application.
    MainApplication
    Main application entry point for the Recipe Management System.
    Model
    Model class serves as the main business logic layer for the recipe management application.
    ModelMethod
    Interface defining the contract for model operations in the recipe management system.
    NutritionService
    Service class for handling nutrition-related calculations and data management.
    NutritionService.NutritionData
    Inner class representing nutritional data for an ingredient.
    PreparationStep
    PreparationStep entity class representing a single step in recipe preparation.
    PreparationStepMapper
    MyBatis mapper interface for PreparationStep entity operations.
    Recipe
    Recipe entity class representing a recipe in the recipe management system.
    RecipeCreateFXMLController
    RecipeCreateFXMLController manages the user interface and business logic for recipe creation and editing.
    RecipeCreateView
    RecipeCreateView is a JavaFX Stage that provides the user interface for creating and editing recipes.
    RecipeDisplayFXMLController
    RecipeDisplayFXMLController manages the user interface for displaying recipe details.
    RecipeDisplayView
    RecipeDisplayView is a JavaFX Stage that provides the user interface for displaying recipe details.
    RecipeIngredient
    RecipeIngredient represents an ingredient used in a recipe with its nutritional information.
    RecipeIngredientMapper
    MyBatis mapper interface for RecipeIngredient entity operations.
    RecipeMapper
    MyBatis mapper interface for Recipe entity operations.
    RecipeSelectFXMLController
    RecipeSelectFXMLController manages the main recipe selection interface.
    RecipeSelectView
    JavaFX Stage class for the recipe selection view of the recipe management application.
    RecipeService
    RecipeService provides comprehensive business logic for recipe management operations.
    SearchTest
    Test class for search functionality validation in the recipe selection interface.
    SessionManager
    Session management utility class for handling user session data.
    SignTest
    Test class for user registration (sign up) functionality validation.
    SignupFXMLController
    FXML Controller class for the signup view.
    SignupFXMLControllerTest
     
    SignupView
    JavaFX Stage class for the signup view of the recipe management application.
    UIUtils
    Utility class providing common UI-related helper methods.
    User
    User entity class representing a user in the recipe management system.
    UserMapper
    MyBatis mapper interface for User entity operations.
    UserService
    Service class for handling user-related operations including authentication and registration.
    ValidationService
    ValidationService provides comprehensive validation functionality for recipe-related data.
